DOC.brief_summary: Perinatal depression significant concern , particularly low-income woman . Many case perinatal depression complicate comorbidities post-traumatic stress disorder symptom , anxiety , intimate partner violence . Providing perinatal mental health service woman home visit program could considerable public health significance . This study develop test integrate model mental health service embed within home visitation ( HV ) program . This model ( 1 ) incorporate protocol systematic screen referral ; ( 2 ) strengthen formal linkage HV program component service system ; ( 3 ) promote capacity service system provide evidence-based early intervention treatment depression ; ( 4 ) facilitate receipt early intervention treatment service perinatal depression comorbid condition . This first model knowledge systematically integrate screening , referral , early intervention treatment perinatal depression associate comorbidities within HV program . The specific aim : 1 . To develop integrated model perinatal depression care within HV program . This integrated model ( `` SCRIPT '' ) incorporate screening , referral , individualized prevention treatment service . 2 . To assess feasibility implement SCRIPT model high fidelity two HV program . One HV program—DRUM Healthy Families—will use paraprofessional interventionists program—M & I Nursing—will use nurse social worker interventionists . 3 . To determine impact SCRIPT model depressive symptom major depressive episode .
